entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Burgeo
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 11:00 PM NST Wednesday 11 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -6.3°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Burgeo 03:30 AM NST Thursday 12 January 2023
Temperature: -6.3°C

Humidity: 72 %

entry.title: Wednesday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 7 except minus 12 inland.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. A few flurries inland. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low minus 7 except minus 12 inland. Wind chill minus 11 this evening and minus 16 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Wednesday 11 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 4.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. A few flurries inland in the morning. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40. High minus 4. Wind chill near minus 13. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Wednesday 11 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 7 except minus 12 inland.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light in the evening. Low minus 7 except minus 12 inland. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Wednesday 11 January 2023
